data.title: Take out Dive---but food was yummy
data.text: located on Baltimore street in the downtown area---NOT the best area of town, but we were walking back to our motel.  Take-out Chinese sounded good and the food did not disappoint.  Yummy Chicken and Broc.  well worth my walk and money, and I would recommend it.

data.title: Outstanding Four Family Dinner
data.text:
We ordered take out from this place because it was late and did not feel like going out again.  Chinese food was the best option we found that would deliver to our hotel and we took a chance on this place based on a recommendation from an employee of the hotel.  We were very happy with our choice and almost knocked off our feet with the quality of the food delivered to us.

We ordered the Four Family as our main dish, served with white rice.  The Shrimp was excellent, beef was tender and spicy, chicken delicious, and porl great.  Veggies were cooked crispy and cut bite sized, not in enormous chunks like so many other places do.  I must add that the rice was perfectly cooked, not dry and not wet.  Very flavorful rice and went well with the food.

We had the Crab Rangoons as our appetizer and found pieces of what appeared to be real crab, not imitation in the cream cheese.  The wanton wrappers were NOT burned or undercooked, but, as Goldilocks would have said, "Just right." They even gave us a "free" bottle of water with the order.  

The amount of food we received was perfect for the two of us to split.  The only con was there was only one fork, but got another from the hotel bar.  Delivery was extra, so be prepared for that, but is was very fast - less than 20 min. from my call to the door of the hotel.

data.title: For A Take Out Dive - Not Too Bad
data.text: So I got some chix fried rice tonight.  Pretty over seasoned.   It was hot (temp).  The place is a typical Chinese take out dive.  I surely would not go there for a family dinner but if I was drunk and needed some food after I left the "block" -- this would be an ok place to go.

data.title: Frankly, this is not bad...
data.text: Frankly, this is not bad compare to all the other equally greazy and horrible chinese take out place.  Their flavoring is a little more Southern, and since I am a Southerner I like it :-p
